list_of_reviews.review_title: Unable to use my money despite proving to them it is lawful
list_of_reviews.review: I was using bitget normally, but my card stopped being accepted so tried using a different card, that also didn't work. After trying different methods of payments for over two hours, I get a huge questionnaire to upload bank statements, pictures, ID cards... around 15-20 questions. After completing it and proving my legitimate use of this app, they still require prove of the transaction certificate of the person I am sending the money to. This is their private information, and if there is an issue with them, you should be contacting them, not keeping my money hostage. This is not a way to make my account more secure, this is a way to SCAM me and keep my money. I am very new to this, and I am only learning. I am not dealing with huge amounts of cash, I am just learning the crypto world. Stop SCAMMING people and let them use their own money.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They froze my funds for reasons unknown.
list_of_reviews.review: They froze my funds for reasons unknown and then have not repaid me within the 1-3 days. They have taken £1000, with no way to contact customer service. I do not recommend using this app.
Stay away! Marshallswithpartners.com pretending to be TJX are scamming people using this app.Clearly, the app doesn't care by facilitating a platform for crime.

I've been on few exchanges to know that they're good at providing earning products to her users, earning in a passive manner. I'm one of the beneficiary of smart trend that guarantees the principal used not to talk of the smart portfolio bot.It's just that their customer support needs to be improved for a much better experience in my humble suggestion.

never use. very lazy customer service, no help whatsoever. pretty sure they faciliate scammers to use this platform. no help received to recover funds or simply investigate when i was subject to a scam.

list_of_reviews.review_title: terrible customer service and not secure
list_of_reviews.review: This app its not secure and its untrusted! Someone was trying to use my account, I noticed some activities that were not mine in my account, so I reported, but stupid me I reported before withdrawing my money from it, they obviously block my account, and after I did all the changes they request me to do it to unblock it, in additional a LIVE video from zoom with the team, and months later my account still BLOCKED, and they are again asking the same things I already did and ANOTHER VIDEO! Its just absurd, obviuosly they don't want me to close the account, because this is the only reason why I want to withdraw the money. TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE

The fact that they have Messi as their Ambassador doesn't make them a secure company and they're definitely not transparent. Even if the company is legit, they're more of a scam. A hidden scam though. The fact that they stop withdrawals when they want to, until they want to, without giving a specific date, that's already a scam to me. No wonder they're not available in US, UK and Canada.

list_of_reviews.review_title: When ever I buy suddenly price goes up…
list_of_reviews.review: When ever I buy suddenly price goes up 0.5-1% after I click buy and the again comes back in a secAnd eventually my order is placed at a higher price Response to bitget reply:I’ve used binance and other platforms but comparing that bitget have a glitch in it that prices are not updated by sec instead every 10-20sec my system and wifi is all ok as I also use other platforms but bitget have problems 90% of time

They have frozen my account. I have provided them with all the paperwork as well as screenshots etc of my work and I still don't have a resolution or any idea why my account is frozen. Customer service is a Robot and when a 'human' does pick up the enquiry they say its is resolved and the ticket is closed!! I am new to trading but the whole experience with this lot leaves a lot to be desired!! I just want my funds out of the account now.

BITGET is the WORST exchangeThey hold your funds - when you deposit CC they give ZERO accountability They let a test transaction go. but not the bulk and they are being silent not even answering no details nothing, they refuse to tell me what happened to my fundsThese guys are TERRIBLE THIEFS!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Never had such a bad experience with an exchange!
list_of_reviews.review: Never had such a bad experience with an exchange.Registration was cumbersome.Depositing fiat was not possible due to the fact that BANXA could not handle iDeal. Of which the claimed they could.After transferring TRX they FROZE my account for an unknown reason?I cannot login and therefore cannot use their support chat!After opening a support ticket it takes them forever to respond. Account still FROZENTHEY MESSED UP MY MAIN REASON FOR USING THEM BY IGNORING THE REFERRAL CODE I REGISTERED WITH.THE RERERAL IS OF VITAL IMPORTANCE TO ME.THEY SAY THEY CANNOT CHANGE THE REFERRAL WHICH THEY DIT NOT USE AFTER ALL! I WANT THE MONEY BACK THAT I TRANFERRED THEY ARE SITTING ON IT! THEY STOLE IT!

Pure Scam. They promise you to make money. You can invest as much as you want without any verification and check/control. Then, if you want to withdraw only a part, they block you. It means you can’t access your money you invested. Not only about profits, even not your initial funds. After they tell you that you wan in a reward some thousands of dollars, in my case over 300’000. But they ask first to pay 50’000 to the access to your funds and then also the reward of 300’000. Guess what happens if you pay 50’000. Nothing. Maybe another excuse for another fee to pay to get access to what belongs to you. Absolutely fraudulent if a platform blocks access to your funds you paid and invested.

So it is more likely that your platform stole my $1,600 in virtual currency, or it was one of your insiders.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Bitget Wallet stole my funds of 1600…
list_of_reviews.review: The bitget virtual currency wallet platform is a big scam. The first time I transferred money to this platform, my funds were transferred away without my consent. I wrote many emails to inform the other party, and each time the other party responded by asking me to provide the transaction ID and wallet address. Then I went to their community to find their community staff to tell them about what happened to me, and their community staff directly banned me. I changed my identity and went into the community to complain, but was banned again. Recently, the bitget wallet suddenly sent me an email to respond that the bitget wallet would not compensate my losses, and the reason was that  Maybe I leaked my private password, or other unknown problems led to my fund loss. I would like to ask your platform, why didn’t you steal my money? In addition to you, who else has the ability to make my money disappear within an hour of my first transfer to your platform? I don’t believe anyone would pay attention to an account that has no previous transaction records, and no one has the ability to steal my funds as soon as they are transferred to your platform without any previous transaction records. So it is more likely that your platform stole my $1,600 in virtual currency, or it was one of your insiders.

Finally after almost 6months bitget froze my account, restrictions were lifted yesterday MARCH 30th 2024. I successfully removed all my funds from bitget, maybe because i threatened to file a lawsuit against them, it was nice doing business with you. GOOD BYE..
